name: Venomoth GX
author: 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Shinobi Mastery
attacks.effect: If you played Koga’s Trap from your hand during this turn, this attack does 90 more damage. If you played Janine from your hand during this turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Ten-Card Return GX
attacks.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 10 cards. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
